publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3438 Christine Grahame: Justice 1 Committee, Report on the Prison Estates Review—That the Parliament notes the 6th Report, 2002 of the Justice 1 Committee, Report on the Prison Estates Review (SP Paper 612).
